Detailed Description

Bit manipulation routines.

Módulo con rutinas de manipulación de vectores de bits extraído de una librería de rutinas para CP/M

CONTENIDO: bv_new(bv, bits) bv_fill(bv, value) bv_set(bv, bitnum) bv_test(bv, bitnum) bv_nz(bv) bv_and(bv3, bv1, bv2) bv_or(bv3, bv1, bv2) bv_xor(bv3, bv1, bv2) bv_disp(title, bv)

Precondition:
stdio.h
alloc.h
mem.h
ULTIMA MODIFICACION: LIBRARY.C, LIBRARY.H by A. J.-L. (1983) Traducción al castellano (1986) Extracción e implementación en PC-AT (José Ramón Valverde Carrillo, 1989)

Author:
Andy Johnson-Laird. The programmer's CP/M handbook. Ed. Osborne / McGraw-Hill. 1983
COPYRIGHT: McGraw-Hill (1983)

Function Documentation

bit_vector bv_new (  bits    ) 
 

bit_vector bv_new(bits) Create a new bit vector and set to zeros Reserve the memory space needed for the bit vector.

Parameters:
bits  size in bits of the vector
Returns:
a new bit vector, or NULL if there is not enough memory
